<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1239</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A (Purim) Feast for the Mind</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">A (Purim) Fest für den Verstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Régal de A (Purim) pour l'esprit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Festa de A (Purim) para a mente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Festività di A (Purim) per la mente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιορτή α (Purim) για το μυαλό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Banquete de A (Purim) para la mente</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners research Megillat Esther and Ancient Persia in order to plan and hold a dinner party for the heroes and villains of the Purim story.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ancient Persia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">purm story</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfängerforschung Megillat Esther und altes 
Persien zwecks eine AbendessenPartei für die Helder und die 
Schufte der Purim Geschichte planen und anhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">recherche Megillat Esther et Perse antique 
d'étudiants afin de projeter et tenir une partie de dîner pour les 
héros et les bandits de l'histoire de Purim.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pesquisa Megillat Esther e Persia antigo dos 
learners a fim planear e prender um partido do jantar para os heróis 
e os bandidos da história de Purim.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ricerca Megillat Esther e Persia antica dei 
principianti per progettare e tenere un partito del pranzo per gli 
eroi ed i furfanti della storia di Purim.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έρευνα Megillat Esther και αρχαία Περσία 
αρχαρίων προκειμένου να προγραμματιστεί και να κρατηθεί ένα 
συμβαλλόμενο μέρος γευμάτων για τους ήρωες και τους κακοποιούς 
της ιστορίας Purim.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">investigación Megillat Esther y Persia antigua 
de los principiantes para planear y llevar a cabo un partido de la 
cena para los héroes y los bandidos de la historia de Purim.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Altes Persien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">purm Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Perse Antique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire de purm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Persia Antigo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">história do purm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Megillat Esther</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχαία Περσία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
